    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdvanceOrder
    Advance order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    AdvanceOrderTest
     
    AirLiftOrder
    Airlift order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    AirLiftOrderTest
     
    BlockadeOrder
    Blockade order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    BombOrder
    Bomb order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    BombOrderTest
     
    Cards
     
    CommandHandler
    This class handles all commands and invocation of all command methods take place here.
    CommandOutputMessages
    This class contains output messages of each command.
    Commands
    This enum contains all commands and their valid attributes.
    CommonConstants
    This class contains all global constants.
    CommonErrorMessages
    This class contains all global error messages.
    Continent
    The 'Continent' class represents the Continent in the game map.
    Country
     
    DeployOrder
    Bomb order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    DiplomacyOrder
    Diplomacy order command functionality and validation are present in this class
    DiplomacyOrderTest
     
    DisplayUtil
    This class contains util method for displaying the map.
    GameEngine
    The main game engine set of codes are present here.
    GamePhaseHandler
    Handles the game phase and changes after each players turn.
    GamePlayHandler
    Gameplay related codes are present in this class
    GameStartUpPhase
    Game startup phase related codes are present here.
    HelperUtil
    This class contains helper methods to perform small operations.
    IssueOrderHandler
    Order related functions are present in this class
    IssueOrderPhase
    Issue Order Phase implements the Phase interface and contains code related to the command given by the Player.
    LoadMapPhase
    Initial phase of the game where the player initialises a map and the code related to this are present here.
    LoadMapTest
    Unit test for the processMap method in LoadMap.
    LogEntryBuffer
    Shows a buffer for log entries that notifies observers when updated
    LogFileWriter
     
    LogManager
     
    LogUtil
    This class contains the base method for logging all game activities.
    Map
    The `Map` class represents the game map, which includes continents and countries.
    MapOperationsHandler
    All important methods which are used for processing a map related command are written here.
    Observable
    Shows an observable entity
    Observer
    Shows an observer that can be updated by an observable
    Order
    Basic interface/structure of all orders
    Phase
    This interface is the basic structure of the entire phase management.
    Player
    This java file is used to define a player in the game Contains all the attributes of a player.
    PlayerOperationsHandler
    All operations related to a Player likeDeploycommand is written here
    ValidationUtil
    This class contains util method for validating.
